body_html:
So I replaced the non-linearity in the encoder from relu to sigmoid, and it works.
However, that should not happen, since the output non-linearity has always been a sigmoid. I am not sure how the loss MSELoss(output, label) between output and labels is being influenced by latent variable, z in the network and causing this error.
body_text:
So I replaced the non-linearity in the encoder from relu to sigmoid, and it works.
However, that should not happen, since the output non-linearity has always been a sigmoid. I am not sure how the loss  MSELoss(output, label) between output and labels is being influenced by latent variable, z in the network and causing this error.
body:
So I replaced the non-linearity in the encoder from relu to sigmoid, and it works.
However, that should not happen, since the output non-linearity has always been a sigmoid. I am not sure how the loss ` MSELoss(output, label)` between output and labels is being influenced by latent variable, z in the network and causing this error.
